name: Biton Vidales
personality: Adventurous and fearless, Biton is an extremely skilled and experienced fighter pilot who loves the thrill of flying. He's confident, competitive and has a good sense of humor, but can be impatient with bureaucracy and authority that he perceives as getting in the way of his mission.
story: Biton was born in Athens, Greece, and knew from an early age that he was destined to fly. After completing his compulsory military service as a paratrooper, he joined the Hellenic Air Force, where he quickly rose through the ranks as a natural leader and top-notch pilot. Biton has seen plenty of combat in various theaters, including the Balkans, Iraq and Syria. He's survived several near-death experiences, including being shot down twice, and has received numerous medals and commendations for his bravery and skill in the air. After his last deployment, Biton decided to take a break from active duty and took a job as a mercenary fighter pilot. He likes the freedom and flexibility of working for himself, and enjoys the challenge of taking on different kinds of missions for clients across the globe.
